moves.1. g3: First move here is made by white.
moves.1... g6: Black sends a defence;the White's pawn won't make it to the other side.
moves.2. e4: But this is not white's intension.
moves.2... f5: Black is confused; he sends out an attack!
moves.3... h6: This pawn is the bait. If the queen captures it, the rook will get her.
moves.4. Qxg6#: CHECKMATE! The queen captures the OTHER pawn and the king is stuck!
